com.cboe.interfaces.domain.product
Interface ReportingClassHome

public interface ReportingClassHome

A home for creating and finding reporting classes.

Field Summary
static java.lang.String HOME_NAME
          Name that will be used for this home.
 
Method Summary
 ReportingClass create(ReportingClassStruct newClass)
          Creates new instance of a ReportingClass from the passed values.

          Searches for reporting class by key.

          Searches for reporting class by symbol and product type.

          Searches for all reporting classes of the given product type.

          Purges old obsolete reporting classes and marks old inactive classes obsolete.

findByType

ReportingClass[] findByType(short type,
                            boolean activeOnly)
Searches for all reporting classes of the given product type.

Parameters:
type - product type for search
activeOnly - if true, the result set will only contain active classes
Returns:
array of found reporting classes

purge

void purge(long retentionCutoff)
Purges old obsolete reporting classes and marks old inactive classes obsolete.

Parameters:
retentionCutoff - the time in millis to be used as the end of the retention period
